casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Peter ANDERSON, alias Paul McKean, Defendant-Appellant. No. 118. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 17, 1930. Louis Halle, of New York City (Milton R. Kroopf, of New York City, on the brief), for appellant. Howard W. Ameli, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Herbert H. Kellogg, of Brooklyn, N. Y., and J. Bertram Wegman, Asst. U. S. Attys., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
